column5: It sucks when life is essentially over, but you have to keep breathing.  I have a commitment to my children.  My fucking wife won't do it.

Approx 24"   Yes that is exactly what my plan is.   Although to be clear, I'm only planning a single 4x4 at each attachment point.  A buddy also suggested I make a [(2)2x8 & construction adhesive] header for each space, but it concerned me that I would essentially be putting a bolt between two pieces of wood.
That's good thinking.  I have some scrap 2x4 that I could make cross members on the opposite sides of the 4x4
Twisting of the rafter, or the 4x4?   I thought a 4x4 tied into two rafters would eliminate any rafter twist.   I thought hangers would eliminate the 4x4 twisting.
Through the sides?  Maybe a 4" 5/16 shank?   Pardon my ignorance, but doesn't bolting into the grain like that increase the likelyhood that it splits uner load?

My problem has always been the smell of urine during oral.  My wife stays shaved because otherwise oral doesn't happen before a shower (no spontaneous cunnilingus.)  Other than that the human body is beautiful, hair or not
